successes.title: The Cold Shoulder Calorie Burning Vest
successes.description: Designed by a NASA scientist, this vest burns up to a pound of fat per week (500 calories/day) using comfortable, mild cold exposure.

Pledges.description: Thanks for your support! Follow our updates for the latest on our campaign! Plus, you'll get our PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat - which has everything you need to know about what foods cause fat gain, and what steps are optimal for burning fat! Follow the 7 steps and you're sure to burn more fat and keep it off!
You're Awesome, Thank you! You'll get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat, plus your name listed on our website as a thank you!

Receive the Cold Neck Wrap. Burn up to 150 calories a day wearing this cold scarf twice a day. You'll also get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat

EARLY BIRD SPECIAL! Burn up to 500 calories a day with your own Cold Shoulder Vest. This reward also includes the Cold Neck Wrap for up to 30% add'l fat burn. Get it at this reduced price if you order early!
As a bonus, you'll also get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat

Only want the vest? This reward is the Cold Shoulder Vest ONLY (does not include the Cold Neck Wrap). You'll also get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat

Only want the vest? This reward is the Cold Shoulder Vest ONLY (this reward does not include the Cold Neck Wrap). If you missed our last "Vest Only" offer, here's another opportunity to get just a Cold Shoulder vest below retail value, offered on Kickstarter only!
You'll also get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat

BRUNCH BIRD SPECIAL! You missed the early-bird worm, but the early bird was so popular we decided to offer a "slightly later bird" special! Burn up to 500 calories a day with your own Cold Shoulder Vest. This reward also includes the Cold Neck Wrap for up to 30% add'l fat burn. Get it at this reduced price if you order early!
As a bonus, you'll also get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat

ELEVENSES SPECIAL! Maybe you missed the early-bird worm, and maybe even "brunch" so how about an "Elevenses Special!" Burn up to 500 calories a day with your own Cold Shoulder Vest. This reward also includes the Cold Neck Wrap for up to 30% add'l fat burn. Get it at this reduced price if you order early on Kickstarter ONLY!
As a bonus, you'll also get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat

Only want the vest? This reward is the Cold Shoulder Vest ONLY (this reward does not include the Cold Neck Wrap). If you missed our last "Vest Only" offer, here's another opportunity to get just a Cold Shoulder vest below retail value, offered on Kickstarter only!
You'll also get the E-book copy of The Cold War on Fat, plus the PDF: 7 Tips Scientifically Proven To Burn Fat

"EVERYTHING PACK"
Burn up to 500 calories a day with your own Cold Shoulder Vest. This reward also includes the Cold Neck Wrap for up to 30% add'l fat burn.
